mapper.insert: insert into booking(num, member_id, place_num, room_num, startdate, enddate, cname, cphone) values(reservation_seq.nextval, #{member_id}, #{place_num}, #{room_num}, to_date(#{startdate},'mm-dd-yy'),to_date(#{enddate},'mm-dd-yy'), #{cname}, #{cphone})
mapper.select: select p.num place_num, r.num room_num, pname,rname,price,capacity,rinfo from place p,room r where p.num = r.place_num and r.num = #{room_num}
select * from booking b,place p,room r where b.member_id = #{member_id} and b.room_num = r.num and p.num = r.place_num
mapper.insert: insert into withdraworder(booking_num, member_id, place_num, startdate, enddate, cname, cphone, pname) values(#{num}, #{member_id}, #{place_num}, to_date(#{startdate},'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS'), to_date(#{enddate},'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS'), #{cname}, #{cphone}, #{pname})
mapper.select: select booking_num num, place_num, startdate, enddate, cname, cphone, member_id, pname from withdraworder where member_id = #{member_id}
